Articles.Content:
KSP v0.90.0, OSX v10.10.4

This is the first time I have ever used KSP.

I downloaded the demo but when I open it it acts normally until I try to click Training or Start New.

All the other buttons in the main menu work.

I have tried to delete the settings to reset it to the default settings, but it still behaves the same way.

I need this game for a school project. Please help!
Hi jarrah, the buttons should be working, can you please see the support thread here, it gives information on how to find your game logs and upload them.
